title: fps drop by the day
body:
Hello,
 somewhere between 13. - 15.1 my fps dropped from 120 to 30.
I dont know if it has something to do with installation of graphic driver I did.
Or lol patch that had been released.

I tried everything from reinstalling the game, reinstalling computer, drivers and so on.

Seems to me like my pc cant take the data from the game.
Changing graphics setting dont help.
Only thing that help a bit is change of resolution, but just about 20 fps..
Whey Iam playing my fps is 30, gpu runs at 30%, cpu like 40-50% every core and memory usage is 3000/4000mb.

My pc:
Geforce GT 540M
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2630QM CPU @ 2.00Ghz
3.91 GB RAM
1920 x 1080, 59Hz

replies.body: Your frame drops could certainly have been caused by your driver or even bad update files.  Rolling back your driver and testing it out in a custom game could help rule out possibilities with that.  Otherwise, try out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out possibilities and tune things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
